alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Baca and east central Las Animas Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms just southwest of Pritchett, or 17 miles southwest of Springfield, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pritchett around 500 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
